TutorialPart.Title: Exploration
TutorialPart.Text: Exploration is the key to survival in Beyond The Veil. By exploring you can discover numerous regions, each with their own obstacles.

TutorialPart.Title: Temples
TutorialPart.Text: All Temple regions must be visited and cleansed before the Gate will open, and allow you to travel into The Veil.

TutorialPart.Title: Saving Progress
TutorialPart.Text: Your progress is autosaved periodically, but you can save manually from the pause screen when out of combat.

TutorialPart.Title: The Map
TutorialPart.Text: The Map allows you to discover and revisit regions. Regions require a certain amount of Life to reach. You can always return to the Gate regardless of your life.

TutorialPart.Title: The Compass
TutorialPart.Text: Your compass reveals interesting points on the map. Each use of the compass consumes 1 Will.

TutorialPart.Title: Health
TutorialPart.Text: When a characters health reaches zero in combat, they die. If the Wanderer dies, your journey is over.

TutorialPart.Title: Accuracy
TutorialPart.Text: Your current accuracy is shown at the top of the screen.

TutorialPart.Title: Attributes
TutorialPart.Text: You have 2 attributes- Life and Will.

TutorialPart.Title: Life
TutorialPart.Text: Life increases your maximum health in combat, your movement speed, and your maximum travel distance.

TutorialPart.Title: Will
TutorialPart.Text: Will increases your compass charges, and decreases the charge time on your skills.

TutorialPart.Title: Crafting
TutorialPart.Text: Resources found in the world can be used to craft a variety of different items.

TutorialPart.Title: Resources
TutorialPart.Text: Crafting recipes are unlocked over time. You can view and craft recipes through the Craft action.

TutorialPart.Title: Weapons
TutorialPart.Text: Weapons come in a number of different varieties, all of which with unique firing behaviours.

TutorialPart.Title: Armour
TutorialPart.Text: Armour absorbs damage in place of your health. When depleted, it must recharge. Shatter damage forces armour to deplete.

TutorialPart.Title: Upgrade
TutorialPart.Text: Armour can be upgraded to absorb more damage.

TutorialPart.Title: Accessories
TutorialPart.Text: Accessories are small trinkets that can further alter your weapon. Only one accessory can be equipped at a time.

TutorialPart.Title: Shrines
TutorialPart.Text: Some areas contain shrines. Shrines provide challenges that can improve your character.

TutorialPart.Title: Inscriptions
TutorialPart.Text: Inscriptions can be used to improved your weapons, for a price.

TutorialPart.Title: Damage Types
TutorialPart.Text: There are 3 types of alternate damage. Shatter depletes armour. Fire causes damage over time. Void stacks to a critical level, and deals massive damage.
